summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3666 for the improvement of 9th Avenue North, from the connection with existing trunk sewer on Republican Street to Westlake Avenue North; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45142, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
